rooms.description: A spacious entrance leading to the living area, designed with minimalist aesthetics.
Open-plan kitchen and living area integrated seamlessly. Vastu compliant: kitchen placed in south-east corner to align with fire element energy.
A dedicated library area with built-in shelves and ample natural lighting from the north window. Minimalist design with neutral colors adhering to Vastu.
A home theater with acoustic panels and a projector screen. Located in the west section of the ground floor for optimal sound insulation and adherence to Vastu principles.
A minimalist bathroom with efficient layout and natural light, ensuring privacy and cleanliness in design.

openings.description: Main entrance door that aligns with Vastu for positive energy flow.
Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation as per traditional design norms.
